Inner Engineering

Isha Yoga is not just a practice - it is a living phenomenon. When you do it like an offering, it changes the very fundamentals of who you are!

- Sadhguru

Welcome to Isha Singapore!

Congratulations on completing the recent Inner Engineering program, we hope you are enjoying your Shambhavi.

The program photos will soon be uploaded on our facebook page. Please like our facebook page to keep yourself posted.

Monthly Group Meditation (Sathsang)
 

We conduct monthly group meditation sessions for those initiated into Shambhavi. It is an opportunity to deepen your kriya with Sadhguru guiding you through the Shambhavi practice. You can also receive corrections for your kriya by trained Isha volunteers and enjoy powerful guided meditations and exclusive videos screened at the sessions. Please ensure to be on empty stomach. We close doors at 5.45PM sharp to ensure other meditators are not disturbed, so please ensure you are on time.

Date & Time: Saturday, 5th Nov '16 - 6:00pm to 8:30pm
Venue: SCCCI Building, Auditorium, Level 2, 47 Hill Street #09-00,
Singapore 179365 (5 mins walk from City Hall MRT Station Exit B)
Isha Kriya

A simple yet powerful 12-minute meditation process created by Sadhguru. It has the potential to transform the life of anyone who is willing to invest just 12 minutes a day.

Date Venue
Sun 23 Oct'16 Jurong Spring CC
Sun 23 Oct'16 Yuhua CC
Sun 30 Oct'16 Jurong Spring CC
Sun 30 Oct'16 Woodlands CC

Isha Upa Yoga

These 5-minute processes are easy-to-practice yet potent tools to enhance health, joy, peace, love, success and inner exploration, helping one cope with the hectic pace of modern life and realize their full potential in all spheres of life.

Register Here
Surya Kriya - Fire up the Sun within
 

Surya Kriya, the forefather to Surya Namaskar (Sun Salutation) is a powerful process of activating the sun within you. It balances a person’s energies, leading to stability of the body and stillness of the mind. This strong foundation becomes the basis to explore higher dimensions of life.

  • Develops mental clarity and focus
  • Remedies weak constitutions
  • Balances hormonal levels in the body
  • Prepares one for deeper states of meditation

Date & Time: 19th & 20th Nov, 8am to 11am
Venue: Sri Thendayuthapani Temple,
15 Tank Rd, Singapore 238065

Register
Angamardana - The Ultimate Yogic Workout
 

Angamardana means gaining complete mastery over the limbs, organs and other parts of the body. This practice is believed to be a pre-cursor of various martial arts. It creates aerobic exercise and muscle tone without bringing rigidity into the body.

  • Strengthens the spine, skeletal and muscular systems
  • Builds physical strength and fitness
  • Invigorates the body, bringing a sense of lightness and freedom
  • Prepares the body for Hatha Yoga

Date & Time: 19th & 20th Nov, 2pm to 6pm
Venue: Sri Thendayuthapani Temple,
15 Tank Rd, Singapore 238065

Register
